title: Trump DOJ rolls back policies protecting LGBTQ+ inmates from sexual violence
description: Donald Trump's Department of Justice is no longer enforcing protections against sexual violence for LGBTQ+ inmates.
content:
Donald Trump's Department of Justice is no longer enforcing protections against sexual violence for LGBTQ+ inmates.
